GAME_OVER - Static variable in class kopper.tetris.core.TetrisGame.State
This is the constant representing the game when it is over and the user has lost.

This is the constant representing the game when it is paused.

This is the constant representing the game when it running and being played.

This is the constant representing the game when it is first started up.

getAbsoluteCellPos(int) - Method in class kopper.tetris.shape.Shape
This method adds the cell center returned by Shape.getAbsoluteShapePos() to each of this cell's relative coordinates.
getAbsoluteShapePos() - Method in class kopper.tetris.shape.Shape
Returns this shape's absolute position, which is always the axis of rotation and typically the center cell of the Shape's numerous cells.
